A Professional Web Designer & Front - End Developer

The future is now. Web and mobile applications are typically the first interaction a potential customer will have with a business. Trusting a professional developer to deliver a professional product is an essential to success in the digital age. .

01

Portfolio

Task: Create a portfolio style website featuring a prominent furniture designer. old.

Solution: Being that Starck is a user focused and practical designer, I chose to a simple and elegant design that was easy to navigate yet stylish.

See Website

02

Imagery

Task: Create a timeline featuring Space X while using similar styling to the company.

Solution: In the style of Space X, I chose large full window photographs and use a parallax scroll in order to maintain a highly visual, modern aesthetic.

See Website

03
